name: Pandaloo The temple of Eden
description:
Pandaloo, The Temple of Eden is story driven puzzle adventure which gives the player ability to control a panda prompted by an unexpected sequence of events to embark on an adventure of discovering his own identity and finding other pandas, all thanks to a legend passed down from generation to generation. By solving puzzles, player follows ancient artifacts that he finds around level and they show him the way to the ancient temple, which proves the truth of the legend and hides important information about the survival of his species.  

The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo which includes first chapter of the game. First chapter (tutorial level) is primarily focused on player's learning of survival mechanics, the mechanics of movement, jumping, interaction with objects and the discovery of puzzles.

Control Sheme

This is a third person game.  The player is taking control over panda with W (forward), S (back), A (left), D (right) keys on the keyboard, and rotates the camera around the main character with the MOUSE.
With SPACE key the player jumps, and with the F key he communicates with the
environment. By holding SHIFT button player affects on Pandaloo's stamina.
